key_channel_insights.line_content: OTA channel improved competitiveness with prices lower than the airline's site 16.09% of the time last week.
MSE consistently offers lower prices with 95.6% of sampled itineraries priced below the airline's site.
GDS channel prices are identical to Saudia's website 68.59% of the time, with lower prices in 12.20% of cases offering potential growth in competitiveness.

conclusion.line_content: This report provides a high-level summary of the price discrepancies observed across different channels.  It is important to note that the data contains many nuances depending on various factors such as market conditions, booking windows, and the competitive landscape. Understanding these subtleties can be critical in optimizing pricing strategies and ensuring competitive positioning.

As part of our 'PriceEye' solution, we are developing an intuitive dashboard designed to help your airline's analysts drill down into this data. This tool will allow you to uncover and focus on critical actionable insights, enabling your team to make data-driven decisions with confidence.

We are here to support you in leveraging these insights to enhance your revenue management and distribution strategies. Please don't hesitate to connect with our team for more information about how PriceEye can assist you in achieving your business objectives.

ota_highlights.line_content: 67.77% of prices on the OTA channel matched those on the airline's website, indicating stable alignment.
OTA prices were lower than the airline's site 16.09% of the time, showing marginally improved competitiveness.
Pricing discrepancies on OTA remained stable, with less than a 0.1% change.

ota_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Prices not found on the OTA channel remained minimal and stable.
Last week's prices matched 67.77% of the time across OTA and airline pricing.

ota_summary_by_region.line_content: Short-haul routes had OTAs offering lower prices 16.67% of the time last week.
Long-haul fares are 74.48% aligned between OTA and airline pricing.

ota_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: Saudi Arabia origin flights had a 68.25% match rate with the airline pricing.
OTAs priced lower 27.48% of the time for Non-SA regions, reflecting competitive positioning.

ota_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: For close-in bookings, OTAs offered lower prices in 17.49% of cases last week.
Far-out bookings had a 72.19% alignment with the airline pricing.

mse_highlights.line_content: MSE offers lower prices than the airline's site consistently across dimensions.
Minimal fluctuations in short-haul and long-haul flights over the recent week.
MSE platform prices were lower for 95.6% of itineraries.

mse_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: 6% month-over-month decline in cases where MSE did not offer website deals.
MSE offers lower prices 94.44% to 97.03% of the time in analyses.

mse_summary_by_region.line_content: Short-haul flights dominate MSE but show less favorable pricing than long-haul.
Long-haul saw a 1.54% improvement in lower pricing frequency on MSE.

mse_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: 95.36% of SA-origin prices were lower on MSE, with a decrease in frequency last week.
Non-SA origins maintained stable lower pricing, with less than 2% change.

mse_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: Close-in bookings saw a 0.21% decrease in lower price offers on MSE.
Far-out bookings showed consistent lower pricing month-over-month on MSE.

gds_highlights.line_content: 68.59% of GDS prices matched Saudia's site.
15.70% of GDS prices were higher than Saudia's site last week.
GDS offers prices lower than Saudia's in 12.20% of cases.

gds_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: GDS fares matched Saudia's website in 68.59% of cases.
12.20% of GDS pricing was lower, indicating channel-specific pricing.

gds_summary_by_region.line_content: 82.89% price parity in Middle East with GDS discounts at 13.92%.
82.89% price match in Non-Middle East regions, with 1.97% lower prices.

gds_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: 66.19% price consistency for Middle East origins on GDS.
82.89% consistency for international origins, with 1.97% GDS price advantages.

gds_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: Close-in GDS bookings had competitive rates 13.79% of the time.
Far-out bookings had 70.27% identical pricing, with discounts in 9.12% of cases.
